description.value:
Necrotic

Aura 3

Whenever an enemy starts its turn within the aura, the enemy takes 10 necrotic damage and Dregoth makes a saving throw.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ necrotic

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 (one creature)

+35 vs. AC

Hit: 4d12 + 2 damage, and ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ cold

Standard

Attack: Melee 3 (one creature)

+35 vs. AC

Hit: 6d6 + 7 damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 cold damage and is slowed (save ends both).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ necrotic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 20 (one creature)

+34 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 6d10 + 4 necrotic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Dregoth uses bite once and claw once, or uses claw twice.

Encounter ✦ cold, fear, necrotic

Standard

Attack: Close blast 5 (creatures in the blast)

+34 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d10 + 8 cold damage plus 2d10 + 8 necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized and takes a -4 penalty to AC and Fortitude (save ends both).

Encounter

Standard

Attack: Close burst 3 (creatures in the burst)

+34 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 6d10 + 4 damage.

Special: Dregoth can score a critical hit with this attack on a roll of 17-20.

Encounter ✦ psychic

Move

Effect: Dregoth becomes insubstantial and is phasing, and he shifts 8 squares. If Dregoth enters a creature's square, he knocks the creature prone and the creature takes 15 psychic damage.

At-Will 1/round ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: Dregoth alters his physical form to appear as a Medium male dragonborn or a gray-scaled, dragonlike humanoid until he uses change shape again or until he drops to 0 hit points. He retains his statistics in his new form. His clothing, armor, and other possessions do not change. To assume a specific individual's form, he must have seen that individual. Other creatures can make a DC 47 Insight check to discern that the form is a disguise.

Recharge 5, 6, or when first bloodied

Minor

Effect: Dregoth regains the use of an expended encounter power.

At-Will ✦ fire, necrotic

Triggered

Trigger: Dregoth is hit by a creature within 4 squares of him.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Melee 4 (the triggering creature)

+34 vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d6 + 9 damage, and ongoing 15 fire and necrotic damage (save ends), and Dregoth slides the target 5 squares.

system.biography:
HP 1072; Bloodied 536
Resist 20 fire, 20 necrotic Immune disease, poison 		Init +20 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 44Fort 43Ref 40Will 43
Speed 8, fly 10
Ability ScoresStr 31 (+25)
Con 20 (+20)		Dex 20 (+20)
Int 26 (+23)		Wis 19 (+19)
Cha 28 (+24)
Languages All, telepathy 10
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Arcana +28, History +28, Insight +24Senses Blindsight 5,Darkvision
Passive Perception 29 | Insight 34

Traits
